longBusinessSummary.0: Dalmia Bharat Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells clinker and cement products to individual consumers and institutional customers. It provides Portland slag cement, Portland pozzolana cement, Portland composite cement, ordinary Portland cement, and specialty cement under the Dalmia Cement, Konark Cement, and Dalmia DSP brands. The company also offers refractory products, solutions, and services; sugar products; power; and management consultancy services. The company was formerly known as Odisha Cement Limited and changed its name to Dalmia Bharat Limited in April 2019. Dalmia Bharat Limited was founded in 1939 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.
